skill.name: Divine Shield
skill.description: Fortifies defenses. Reduces damage taken by 40% for 5 secs.

skill.name: Magic Missile
skill.description: Deals 200% DMG to 2 random targets.

skill.name: Slash
skill.description: Deals 300% DMG to target.

skill.name: Death
skill.description: Reduces both Max HP and ATK of a target by 16% for 5s.

skill.name: Storm Hammer
skill.description: Deals 100% DMG to 3 random nearby targets, inflicting Coma for 3 secs.

skill.name: Energetic
skill.description: Restores the HP of 2 nearby allies with the lowest HP by 200% ATK and increases their ATK by 15% for 5 secs.

skill.name: Thunderstorm
skill.description: Lightning strikes a random target, dealing 200% DMG and inflicting Coma to all nearby enemies for 1.5 secs.

skill.name: Body Slam
skill.description: Targets 10 random ground units in battle, dealing 50% DMG, inflicting Stun for 1 sec, and reducing Energy by 10%. (Cooldown: 6 secs)

skill.name: Soul Harvest
skill.description: Deals 180% DMG to 2 enemies on the battlefield and restores HP equal to 15% of DMG dealt.

skill.name: Celebrate
skill.description: Increases ATK, ATK rate, and MOV SPD of allies by 10% for 8 secs.

skill.name: Spectacular Scales
skill.description: Invincible: Deflects DMG from all sources except buildings for 2.5 secs. (Cooldown required)

skill.name: Snowball Fight
skill.description: Deals 75% DMG every 0.5 secs to one nearby enemy for 4 secs and slows that enemy by 10% for 5 secs.

skill.name: Cupid
skill.description: Increases friendly Heroes' Energy by 10 and DMG by 10% for 6 secs. Cooldown: 6 secs.

skill.name: Storm of Seth
skill.description: Surrounds Immortep within a sandstorm for 6 secs. Has a chance to deal 120% DMG and inflict Coma for 1 sec. to units within the sandstorm.

skill.name: Fiery Breath
skill.description: Deals 150% ATK and reduces target's ATK, ATK SPD, and MOV SPD by 25% for 6 secs. Cooldown: 6 secs.

skill.name: Calamity
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 120% ATK to 3 Heroes, reducing their Energy by 20 and inflicting Silence for 1s. Cooldown: 7s

skill.name: Blood Banquet
skill.description: Summons bats for 4s to attack nearby enemies and restore HP to himself. Deals 70% ATK DMG and inflicts Fear for 1.5s. Cooldown: 6s.

skill.name: Savage Swing
skill.description: Deals 160% DMG and slows enemies by 75%. Restores nearby allies HP by 50% DMG dealt. (Immune to Coma and Horror.)

skill.name: Fireworks Bazooka
skill.description: Fires bazookas at 2 random targets, dealing a total DMG equal to 100% ATK over 4s to enemies in the target areas. Also reduces their MOV SPD & ATK SPD by 12% for 4s. (Cooldown: 7s. Hero has Lv5 Self Destruct.)

skill.name: Meteor Slash
skill.description: Deals 160% AoE ATK DMG to nearest foe and other targets nearby. Grants 2 nearby allies immunity to one condition for 4s. (Cooldown 8s. This Hero has Lv5 Revive.)

skill.name: Petal Dance
skill.description: Deals 60% ATK at 3 foes & removes buffs. Heals 3 allies for 60% ATK & removes debuffs. CD: 10s. Has Lv 5 Scatter.

skill.name: Devastation
skill.description: Deals 150% ATK to nearby foes & Stuns them for 1s. For 5s, boost ATK SPD by 10% & deflects 10% damage. CD: 8s. Has Lv 5 Life Drain.

skill.name: Lightning
skill.description: Deals 160% ATK to up to 3 foes in front and increases their damage taken by 10% for 5s. CD: 5s. Has Lv 5 Slow Down.

skill.name: Fire Shield
skill.description: Deals 150% ATK DMG to 3 enemy Heroes, reducing their MOV SPD by 40% for 6s. Also lets 3 allied Heroes deflect 10% DMG taken and have immunity to one condition for 5s. Cooldown: 7s.

skill.name: Battle Hymn
skill.description: Lets 2 friendly Heroes take 10% less damage for 5s and, during offensive battles, revives 2 friendly Heroes with 20% HP. (Cooldown: 6s. Each Hero can only be revived by Exaltation, Arms Race, or Battle Hymn once in a battle.)

skill.name: Plume Blast
skill.description: Deals 100% DMG to 3 foes, reducing their ATK, ATK SPD, and MOV SPD by 10% for 3s. Has Lv 5 Revitalize and fast Energy recovery. CD: 2s.

skill.name: Vengeful Sword
skill.description: Increases Skull Knight's ATK by 350% and limits DMG taken to 12,000 per hit for 10s. Has Lv 8 Revive. CD: 12s.

skill.name: Cannon Blast
skill.description: Deals 90% DMG to 4 random targets & stuns them for 1.5s. Negates 45% of DMG taken for 2.5s. Has Lv 5 Revitalize & fast Energy recovery. CD:3s.

skill.name: Spirit Summon
skill.description: Deals 60% ATK DMG to nearby enemies over 5s. Also heals allies for a total HP equal to 120% ATK, and reduces their DMG taken by 10% for 5s. (Cooldown: 7s. Hero is immune to Stun and Fear.)

skill.name: Sweet Revenge
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 80% ATK to 2 random enemies on the field, reducing their Energy by 18. Also increases the Dodge rate of an ally with lowest HP by 10% for 1s. Hero has Lv 8 Scorch. Cooldown: 5s.

skill.name: Frost Breath
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 100% ATK to enemies in front, freezing them for 1.5s and buildings for 2.5s, removing all buffs. Hero has Lv 5 Condemnation. Cooldown: 6s.

skill.name: Love Cyclone
skill.description: Removes Silence from nearby allies, restores their Energy by up to 24 over 2s, and increases their CRIT Resist Rate by 5%. (Cooldown: 6s. This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity.)

skill.name: Soul Crush
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 80% ATK to a random target on the field, reducing their Energy by 15. Hero has Lv 5 Revitalize and fast Energy recovery.

skill.name: Deafening Roar
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 90% ATK to nearby enemies. For 9s, targets take 10% more DMG and Grizzly takes 20% less DMG. Grizzly always enters battle with Beast Tamer. Cooldown: 12s.Grizzly's skill allows Beast Tamer to take 20% less DMG and greatly increases his CRIT Rate for 3.5s. Grizzly has Lv 8 Heavy Blow. Cooldown: 5s.

skill.name: Judgment
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 55% ATK to the target and enemies near it every 0.5s for 3s. Also stuns them for 1s. Hero has Lv 8 Bulwark. Cooldown: 3s.

skill.name: Possession
skill.description: Original Form: Recovers HP equal to 600% ATK and transforms into a demon. Gains +30% ATK and stun immunity for 12s. Cooldown: 15s Demon Form: Deals DMG equal to 140% ATK to enemies in front and removes their buffs. Hero has Lv 8 Berserk. Cooldown: 3s

skill.name: Whirling Ax
skill.description: Deals 120% ATK DMG to nearby enemies over 5s and reduces the healing they receive by 20%. Also deals 70% ATK DMG to the enemy Hero with the least remaining HP. Hero has Lv 8 Deadly Strike. Cooldown: 7s.

skill.name: Twin Hex
skill.description: Casts a hex on two random areas. Deals 120% DMG over 6s to enemies in those areas. One hex Petrifies enemies for 1s. The other reduces enemy Heroes' Energy by 26. Attacks hit multiple targets. Cooldown: 8s.

skill.name: High Voltage
skill.description: Strikes two random foes three times over 2s, dealing total DMG equal to 210% ATK to each target and inflicting Blinded for 1.5s. Also gains immunity to DMG from attacks and increases CRIT Rate by 20% for 2s. Cooldown: 5s. Hero is immune to Stun and Fear.

skill.name: Dirty Tricks
skill.description: Deals 100% ATK DMG to five random targets and removes their buffs. Also summons two Lv 20 Pumpkies for 15s. Cooldown: 10s. Hero has Lv 8 War God. Pumpkie's skill deals 100% ATK DMG to a nearby enemy and reduces their energy by 16. Cooldown: 3s. Pumpkie has Lv 8 Self Destruct and cannot be revived.

skill.name: Double Trouble
skill.description: Deals 140% ATK DMG to 4 nearby targets, inflicting Stun for 3s. Also summons Doppel for 12s. Cooldown: 15s. Hero is immune to Energy reduction effects. Doppel's skill deals 140% Doppel ATK DMG to 4 nearby targets, inflicting Stun for 3s. Also heals the allied Hero with the lowest HP by 260% Doppel ATK, reducing their DMG taken by 20% for 4s. Cooldown: 5s. Doppel has Lv 8 Berserk.

skill.name: Ring-a-Ling
skill.description: Increases own ATK by 100% and CRIT Rate by 15% for 9s. Cooldown: 12s. Also has Frostbite Talent, which deals 100% ATK DMG to 15 targets every 6s, freezing them for 1s.

skill.name: Divinity
skill.description: Deflects 16% DMG taken for 6s. Also increases ATK and ATK SPD of 6 allied Heroes by 18% for 8s. Cooldown: 8s. When attacked, Hero has 50% chance of summoning an Archangel for 8s. Cooldown: 10s. Archangel does not take damage and is immune to Stun and Fear.

skill.name: Heart Attack
skill.description: Deals 50% ATK DMG to 2 nearby enemy targets every 0.3s for 4s and reduces their Energy by 20. Also restores HP equal to 15% of DMG dealt. Cooldown: 4s. Critical hits from Hero's skill and attacks deal additional 1x damage. This Hero is immune to Stun and Fear. (Base CRIT DMG is 1.5 times of ATK DMG.)

skill.name: Horror Show
skill.description: Deals DMG equal to 95% ATK to a maximum of 100 enemies, and reduces their ATK by 15% for 10s. (Cooldown: 8s.) Hero also transforms for 12s, gaining immunity to Silence and Calamity, reducing DMG received by 20%, and reducing Skill cooldown to 5s. In this form, Hero deals additional DMG to all enemies equal to 3% of their Max HP. (Hero can revive 3 times, each time with 80% HP. Revive Talent and Revive Crest have no effect.)

skill.name: Hidden Zen
skill.description: Slashes enemies in front of the Hero every 0.5s for 3s, dealing a total of 140% ATK DMG. Cooldown: 4s. This Hero is Elusive for 4.5s every 6s. (When Elusive, Hero is undetectable by enemy troops, Totems and Traps, and is immune to all ATK DMG and Conditions. Also increases Hero's CRIT Rate by 90%.)

skill.name: Trick Shot
skill.description: Deals 160% ATK DMG to a random enemy target, and reduces received healing by 10% for 2s. Hero takes 15% less DMG for 2s, and summons a Warflyer for 12s. (Cooldown: 3s. This Hero gains 25 Energy every second.) The Warflyer's skill targets the enemy with the lowest HP percentage, inflicting Coma for 1s and dealing a total of 300% Warflyer ATK DMG to all enemy targets in that area. (Warflyer is Elusive and has Lv5 Scatter. In defense battles, Warflyer ignores Hero Base range.)

skill.name: Rhino Rage
skill.description: Hero transforms into a rhino, recovering HP equal to 60% ATK every 0.5s for 12s. (Cooldown: 14s). While transformed: Hero deals up to a total of 420% ATK DMG to the surrounding area for 3s. Has 50% chance to reduce 18 Energy from each enemy Hero who is hit, for 3s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero is immune to Energy Reduction effects, and has fast Energy recovery.)

skill.name: Overclock
skill.description: Limits Hero's DMG taken to 18,000 per hit for 10s, and increases Hero's ATK SPD by 10% for 10s. (Cooldown: 12s.) Hero fires a mech-fist whenever she attacks, dealing 270% ATK DMG to enemies in the surrounding area. (The Hero will not fire mech-fists when surrounded only by Walls.)

skill.name: Wraith Fire
skill.description: Removes buffs, and deals 120% ATK DMG plus 8,000 Fixed DMG to all enemy targets in an area. (Fixed DMG cannot be mitigated by percentage-based damage reduction.) Hero regains HP equal to 35% of DMG dealt by its skill. (Cooldown: 2s. This Hero is immune to Coma, Fear, Energy Reduction effects, and attacks, for 3.5s. Cooldown: 5s. This Hero has fast Energy recovery.)

skill.name: Blood Ravens
skill.description: Deals 120% ATK DMG to 5 random enemy units, and reduces their healing effects and MOV SPD by 26% for 3s. Heals 4 random friendly Heroes by a total amount of HP equal to 420% ATK, removes all their conditions, and increases their ATK by 7% for 3s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero is immune to Silence and Calamity.)

skill.name: Electroshock
skill.description: Unleashes 2 random electric bolts on enemy unit(s), each dealing 40% ATK DMG every 0.5s for 3s. Each time they take damage, they are inflicted with Coma for 0.3s. (Cooldown: 4s. When attacked, this Hero increases its ATK by 45%, takes 65% less DMG, and becomes immune to Energy Reduction effects, all for 4s. Cooldown: 2s)

skill.name: Light
skill.description: Deals 80% ATK DMG to nearby targets in an area every 0.2s for 5s. Increases 5 friendly Heroes' ATK SPD by 18% for 5s; the friendly Heroes also gain 15 Energy each. (Cooldown: 6s. This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity.)

skill.name: Ice Cloud
skill.description: Deals total DMG of up to 510% ATK to nearby enemy targets for 5s, and freezes them for 0.4s whenever they take damage from this skill. Hero gains immunity to Stun and Fear for 5s. (Cooldown: 7.5s. When attacked, Hero recovers HP equal to 200% ATK. Cooldown: 0.2s.)

skill.name: Spiritual Aid
skill.description: Deals 120% ATK DMG to 4 random enemy targets. Increases Spirit's ATK by 45% and ATK SPD by 20% for 9s. (Cooldown: 9s. Hero and Spirit join the battle together.) Spirit's Skill: Deals DMG equal to 55% Spirit ATK to a maximum of 100 enemies, and recovers HP to itself equal to 35% of the damage dealt. Grants Espirita Elusive for 1s, and HP recovery equal to 200% Spirit ATK. (Cooldown: 2s. Spirit is immune to Stun and Fear, and takes 80% less DMG.)

skill.name: Love To Death
skill.description: Deals 80% ATK DMG per second for 3s to and removes buffs from the enemy Hero with lowest HP. Also summons 1 Love Dove for 12s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero cannot receive more than 18,000 DMG per hit, and has fast Energy recovery.) Love Dove cannot receive more than 1 DMG per hit. When Love Dove is attacked, it increases Dove Keeper's ATK by 45% for 8s. (Cooldown: 8s)

skill.name: Arms Race
skill.description: Deals 120% ATK DMG to 5 enemy units and, during offensive battles, revives 3 friendly Heroes with 30% HP. (Cooldown: 3s. Each Hero can only be revived by Exaltation, Arms Race, or Battle Hymn once in a battle.) (Every 3s, 1 friendly Hero's ATK is increased by 100% and DMG received is reduced by 60% for 3s. Also restores the friendly Hero's HP equal to 600% of Cirrina's ATK.)

skill.name: Shock Pillar
skill.description: Summons a Shock Pillar that deals 450% ATK DMG over 4s to enemy targets in the surrounding area, and inflicts Stun for 1.5s. When a Shock Pillar is in play, Hero takes 14% less DMG and gains immunity to Stun and Fear. (Cooldown: 5s. Hero's basic attack deals DMG equal to 15% of Hero's Max HP.)

skill.name: Septic Swamp
skill.description: Deals total DMG equal to 240% ATK to nearby enemy targets within 5s, and summons a Giant Frog for 5s. When Giant Frog is in play, Hero gains immunity to damage and increased ATK by 80%. (Cooldown: 7s. Hero is immune to Energy Reduction effects.)

skill.name: Eruption
skill.description: Original Form: Removes buffs from 2 enemy Heroes. Deals 150% ATK DMG to 2 nearby enemy Heroes every 0.4s for 8s and increases their DMG received by 18% for 3s. Magma Form: Deals total DMG equal to 520% ATK over 4s to enemy targets in a random area, removes their buffs, and inflicts Paralyze on them for 1.2s. (Hero transforms into Magma Form once it enters the battlefield, and every 10s thereafter. Magma Form lasts for 8s each time. When in Magma Form, Hero recovers 100% of its HP, cannot receive more than 10,000 DMG per hit, and gains immunity to Stun, Fear, and Energy Reduction effects.) This Hero has fast Energy recovery.

skill.name: Power Hungry
skill.description: Deals 120% ATK DMG to 4 nearby enemy targets and reduces their Energy by 5 every second. (This skill will activate only once and last throughout the battle. This Hero is immune to Stun and Fear and deflects 50% of all incoming DMG.)

skill.name: Ice Boulder
skill.description: Throws an icy boulder forward, dealing 90% ATK DMG to and removing 4 Energy from all enemy targets in its path. Also removes Hero's conditions. (This Hero is immune to Stun and Fear, has +100% ATK SPD, takes 75% less DMG, and has fast Energy recovery.)

skill.name: All-out Mischief
skill.description: Slingshot Captain inflicts Petrify on nearby enemy targets in an area for 1s and deals 100% ATK DMG to them. (Cooldown 4s. Has fast Energy recovery.) When attacked, Slingshot Captain has a 40% chance to summon either a Shield Rascal or a Blade Rascal for 8s. (Cooldown: 8s.) When Shield Rascal is summoned, Slingshot Captain reflects 80% of all incoming damage for 5s and restores HP equal to 1600% of Shield Rascal's ATK. When Blade Rascal is summoned, Slingshot Captain's ATK increases by 100% for 6s.

skill.name: Enmity
skill.description: Deals 330% ATK DMG to 5 random enemy targets. Reduces this Hero's DMG taken by 8% for 4s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero has Lv8 Revive, is immune to Stun and Fear, and cannot receive more than 5000 reflected DMG per hit.)

skill.name: Drop Anchor
skill.description: Increases this Hero's ATK by 10% for 4s. Hero also reflects 6% of all incoming damage for 4s. (Cooldown: 4s. When attacked, this Hero deals 250% ATK DMG to enemy targets in a nearby area, and recovers HP equal to 50% of the damage dealt. cooldown: 0.5s.)

skill.name: Frozen State
skill.description: Hero summons an ice shield that grants immunity to attack damage and reflected damage for 5s. Hero also deals 80% ATK DMG to nearby enemy targets every 0.5s for 5s, and Freezes them for 0.2s every 0.5s for 5s. (Cooldown: 7s. This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity. When ice shield is in effect, Hero cannot move, attack, trigger skills, nor obtain boosts and conditions granted by other units.)

skill.name: Plantagion
skill.description: Restores HP to 3 random allied Heroes equal to 240% of Plant Warrior's ATK. Plant Warrior and these allied Heroes each deal 150% ATK DMG to nearby enemy targets. (Cooldown: 4s. Plant Warrior is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity.)

skill.name: Ring of Roses
skill.description: Deals DMG to surrounding targets equal to (90% of Hero's ATK + 5% of target's Max HP) every 1s for 5s. (Cooldown: 8s. Hero takes 70% less DMG, and is immune to Stun and Fear. When in battle, Hero restores HP equal to 30% of her Max HP every 3s.)

skill.name: Twilight Dimension
skill.description: Summons 1 Twilight Dome on a random location. Enemies within the Twilight Dome are Paralyzed and receive DMG equal to 90% of Cosmo's ATK every second. Twilight Dome lasts 2s. When Twilight Dome is in play, this Hero gains immunity to Freeze, Petrify, and Entangle. (Cooldown: 7s. When Hero has at least 50% of his HP, he gains 200% ATK every 4s. When Hero has less than 50% of his HP, he takes 85% less DMG every 4s. Each ATK increase and DMG reduction lasts for 4s.)

skill.name: Excavation
skill.description: Removes buffs from 4 random enemy Heroes, deals them DMG equal to 260% of Ripper's ATK, and Silences them and reduces their healing effects by 15% for 2s. Also increases this Hero's Dodge by 10% for 3s. (Cooldown: 3s. This Hero is immune to Blind, deals DMG that cannot be Dodged, and has fast Energy recovery.)

skill.name: Epicenter
skill.description: Deals 110% ATK DMG to enemy targets in a cross-shaped area (with this Hero at the center of the area of effect). Also Petrifies the targets for 1s. (Cooldown: 3s. When this Hero deals a critical hit, he recovers 30% of HP and gains 40% more ATK for 6s. Cooldown 2s. Hero has Lv9 Scorch and 16% base CRIT Rate. Critical hits from Hero's attacks and skill deal additional 0.5x damage.) (Base CRIT DMG is 1.5 times of ATK DMG.)

skill.name: Maelstrom
skill.description: Deals True DMG equal to 52% ATK to 4 random enemy units and recovers HP equal to 25% of damage dealt every 0.2s for 4s. (True DMG ignores DMG Reduction effects.) (Cooldown: 5s. This Hero summons a whirlwind when he attacks. Whirlwind deals 400% ATK DMG to enemy targets in its path. Also Paralyzes them for 1s. (Cooldown: 2s.) This Hero cannot receive more than 36000 DMG per hit, and is immune to Freeze, Petrify, Entangle, Silence, Energy Reduction effects, and conditions from Calamity.)

skill.name: Occult Arts
skill.description: Throws a poisonous shiv at 1 random enemy target, dealing a total of 320% ATK DMG over 3s. Removes conditions from 2 allied Heroes. Also casts a shield on each of them for 2s. When shields are active, shielded Heroes gain 20% more ATK and convert all DMG received to recover HP. (Cooldown: 3s. This Hero takes 50% less DMG, has fast Energy recovery, and is immune to Stun, Fear and Silence.)

skill.name: Orbs of Agony
skill.description: Deals 160% ATK DMG to and removes 15 Energy from 4 nearby enemy Heroes. Also reduces their Energy regain rate (from normal attacks and receiving damage only) by 25% and removes their buffs for 4s. (Cooldown: 5s. This Hero inflicts Silence on 4 random enemy Heroes for 3s every 5s, reflects 50% of all incoming DMG, and is immune to Stun and Fear.)

skill.name: Hail the Queen
skill.description: Deals 140% ATK DMG to enemy targets in front. Then raises their DMG received by 6% and reduces their healing received by 26% for 3.5s. Also increases the ACC of up to 10 nearby friendly Heroes by 10% for 3.5s. (This buff cannot be removed.) (Cooldown: 5s. This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity. When this Hero is attacked, she grants 70% DMG reduction to 2 friendly Heroes with the lowest HP for 5s. Cooldown: 5s.)

skill.name: Run and Gun
skill.description: Deals True DMG totaling 480% ATK to enemy targets within an arc. (This damage can spread across a max of 3 targets within range). Also removes buffs from the targets that received damage from this skill. For the next 3.5s, deals True DMG equal to 30% ATK to 3 random enemy targets within an arc every 0.25s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero takes 65% less DMG and is immune to Paralyze and Stun. When Hero attacks, he inflicts Paralyze for 1.5s and deals 400% ATK DMG to his target, and recovers HP equal to 45% of the DMG dealt. (Cooldown: 2s.))

skill.name: Haunting Game
skill.description: Deals 110% ATK DMG to 10 nearby enemy targets every 1s for 5s and reduces their ATK by 16% for 3s. Also gains invulnerability for 2s. (Cooldown: 6.5s. This Hero has fast Energy recovery, is immune to Silence, and ignores DMG limits of targets, except for DMG limits of bosses and Reflected DMG limits of Heroes.)

skill.name: Draken Fists
skill.description: Deals 50% ATK DMG to 3 nearby enemy Heroes and reduces each of their Energy by 15 every 1s for 5s. Creates a zone around himself that Immobilizes up to 20 enemy targets for 0.3s every 1s for 3s. (Cooldown: 6s. When this Hero enters the battlefield, he increases his ATK by 100%, ATK SPD by 60%, and takes 60% less DMG; when his HP is below 60%, he further increases his ATK by 200%, ATK SPD by 60%, and takes 60% less DMG every 2s for 2s. He also recovers 20% of his Max HP every 2s.)

skill.name: Ursine Roar
skill.description: Limits DMG taken to 60000 per hit for 4s. (Cooldown: 4s. This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity. Every 6s, Hero has a 100% chance to deal 300% ATK DMG to 10 enemy units and Stun them for 2s.)

skill.name: Exaltation
skill.description: Restores 3 friendly Heroes' HP equal to 100% of Rambard's ATK every second for 4s. For the next 2s, summons a shield on each of them that reflects 5% of DMG received. (This shield cannot be removed.) During offensive battles, also revives 4 friendly Heroes with 20% HP. (Cooldown: 5s. Each Hero can only be revived by Exaltation, Arms Race, or Battle Hymn once in a battle.) (This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity. Every 6s, Hero summons a shield on himself that converts all DMG received to recover HP for 4s.)

skill.name: Spiral Floe
skill.description: Casts a shield that reduces DMG received by 20% for 3s on 2 friendly Heroes with the lowest HP, and removes Silence from them. Crystal Wraith and these friendly Heroes each unleash a special skill once. The special skill deals 80% ATK DMG to nearby enemy units every second for 3s, and increases their DMG received by 4% whenever this special skill hits. (Cooldown: 5s. Crystal Wraith has a 25% chance to increase the DMG received of a random enemy Hero and enemy Heroes near the target by 20% for 5s. Crystal Wraith's basic attack splits to deal DMG to multiple targets.)

skill.name: Winter Storm
skill.description: Summons a blizzard on a random location, which Freezes all enemy units within the area for 2s and deals a total of 400% ATK DMG to them over 5s. They also cannot receive healing for 2s. When a blizzard is in play, Boreal Fox gains 15% more Dodge. (Cooldown: 5s. This Hero is immune to Freeze, Petrify, Entangle, Silence, and Energy Reduction effects, and conditions from Calamity. All DMG from this Hero ignores Elusive.)

skill.name: Biting Wrath
skill.description: Deals 150% ATK DMG to enemy targets in a cross-shaped area (with this Hero at the center of the area of effect). Also increases ATK and ATK SPD of all allied Heroes by 10% for 3.5s. Cooldown: 6s. Hero summons a shield on herself every 6s, gaining invulnerability and immunity to Stun, Freeze, Petrify, and Entangle for 2.5s (effect can be removed). (Reduces Dodge rate of all nearby enemy targets by 40% every 1s for 3s.)

skill.name: Saint
skill.description: Hero transforms into a valkyrie. Disarms nearby enemy targets (they are unable to perform normal attacks, but can trigger their skills) and reduces their CRIT Rate by 12% for 4s. Valkyrie Form: Deals 45% ATK DMG to current target 16 consecutive times (Cooldown: 3s), increases own ATK SPD by 20%, and ignores DMG limits of targets (except for DMG limits of bosses and Reflected DMG limits of Heroes). (Valkyrie Form lasts 10s, with a cooldown of 14s. This Hero is immune to Stun, Silence, Energy Reduction effects, and conditions from Calamity, receives 70% less DMG, and recovers HP equal to 10% of her Max HP every 1s.)

skill.name: Runic Power
skill.description: Deals 100% ATK DMG to and removes 25 Energy from 3 random enemy Heroes. Also Paralyzes them for 1.8s. Paralyzed targets cannot gain Energy from normal attacks and receiving damage, nor receive healing. Removes all conditions from friendly Heroes. Increases CRIT Rate of 6 random friendly Heroes by 12% for 4s. (Cooldown: 6s. This Hero deals 800% ATK DMG to all nearby enemy units every 6s. When he has less than 70% of his HP, he cannot receive more than 9000 DMG per hit, and gains fast Energy recovery and immunity to Stun and Silence.)

skill.name: Critical Burns
skill.description: Deals a total of 460% ATK DMG to at most 10 enemy units along a straight line in front. (Cooldown: 3s. This Hero has 10% base CRIT Rate. When she performs a normal attack, her CRIT DMG increases by 1.5 times and she gains immunity to Stun, both for the next 4s (Cooldown: 6s). Critical hits from Hero's skill and attacks reduce her DMG received by 70% for the next 4s, and restore her HP by 45% and Energy by 60 (Cooldown: 6s)). (Base CRIT DMG is 1.5 times of ATK DMG.)

skill.name: Sound Barrier
skill.description: For 2s, reduces all nearby enemy targets' ATK by 25% and Silences them. Deals 35% ATK DMG to all nearby enemy units and converts 10% of the DMG dealt to recover HP every 0.2s for 4s. (Cooldown: 6s. This Hero is immune to Silence, has high CRIT Resist, and reduces DMG received by 60%. When attacking, Hero has 15% chance to recover 100 Energy.)

skill.name: Shrouded in Darkness
skill.description: Hero enters a Dark Trance (Hero cannot move, attack, trigger skills, nor obtain boosts and conditions granted by other units.) Deals a total of 70% ATK DMG to nearby enemy units every 0.5s (This damage can spread across a max of 3 nearby enemy units). Units that receive damage from this Hero's attack lose 8 Energy per hit, and have their MOV SPD and ATK SPD reduced by 20% for 2s. Dark Trance lasts for 5s. (Cooldown: 7s. This Hero is immune to Silence, Energy Reduction effects and conditions from Calamity. His DMG ignores DMG-to-HP Conversion effects.)

skill.name: Bleeding Cuts
skill.description: Every 1s, deals 180% ATK DMG to 5 enemy targets and recovers HP equal to 20% of DMG dealt. Reduces ACC of targets that received damage from this skill by 8% for 1.5s. When this Hero is killed, he deals 1000% ATK DMG to all nearby enemy units (This damage ignores DMG limits of targets. Hero has a 66% chance to Revive with 60% HP every time he is killed).

skill.name: Frenzied Slash
skill.description: Deals 200% ATK DMG to all nearby enemy targets. Increases this Hero's ATK SPD by 15% and CRIT Rate by 8% for 10s (these buffs cannot be removed). Hero also recovers 6% of his HP every second for 10s. (Cooldown: 14s. This Hero reflects 50% incoming damage and is immune to Stun, Freeze, Petrify, and Entangle. Hero's basic attack deals True DMG equal to 120% of Hero's ATK to his target and nearby enemy units.)

skill.name: Card Trick
skill.description: Throws paper cards, dealing 150% ATK DMG to all enemy targets in front. Also reduces their ATK SPD, Energy regain rate, and Dodge by 5% for 5s. (Cooldown: 7s.) Increases all friendly Heroes' ATK SPD, Energy regain rate, and Dodge by 5% for 5s, and restores their HP equal to 50% of Miss Magic's ATK. (Cooldown: 7s.) (This Hero is immune to Silence and conditions from Calamity. Hero's basic attack has a 50% chance to remove 50 Energy from her target and nearby enemy targets. Cooldown: 3s.)
